person.bio: Honored to be part of a team that has the potential to make the world a better place by connecting billions of people to a new, accessible, data sovereign and environmentally conscious internet. An international entrepreneur and part of a diverse team of innovators redefining the foundation of the internet. Adnan has been based in the United Arab Emirates for the past 20 years, during which he has built successful grass-root businesses and invested startups in various sectors. At ThreeFold Adnan is responsible for driving the ThreeFold Foundation Ecosystem. Adnan is also the CEO of the @Mazraa Cooperative which is a founding farm and P2P Cloud Capacity provider on the ThreeFold Network.
person.excerpt: An international entrepreneur and part of a diverse team of innovators.

node.title: The need for a sustainable digital currency
node.excerpt: Digital currencies are on the way to global adoption as a mainstream currency. Today, there are approximately 130+ billion dollars worth of digital currencies..

node.title: ThreeFold Foundation
node.excerpt: The ThreeFold Foundation along with its partners is growing the ThreeFold Grid and a new peer-to-peer internet.
